name: delete folder
description: Deletes a folder/directory and all its contents.

status.description: Indicates the result of the delete operation

deleted.description: The folder path that was deleted

code:
import os, json
import shutil

path = input_data['path']
try:
    shutil.rmtree(path)
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'success', 'deleted': path})
except Exception as e:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'deleted': '', 'message': str(e)})
